title: Influxdb datasource not found
body:
I configured loudml.yml as below:

datasources:
  - name: capacity_model
    type: influxdb
    addr: localhost:8086
    database: capacity_management
    retention_policy: autogen
storage:
  path: /kafka/loudml/var/lib/loudml

server:
  listen: 0.0.0.0:8077

I have created a model as below, which is successful:

{
        "name":"capacity_model",
        "offset": 30,
        "features":[

                {
                    "metric": "avg",
                    "field": "disk_percent_use",
                    "name": "mean_exchange_disk_usage",
                    "default": 0,
                    "measurement": "capacity_disk_metrics",
                    "anomaly_type": "low_high"
                }

        ],
        "bucket_interval": "1d",
        "min_threshold": 75,
        "max_threshold": 95,
        "default_datasource": "capacity_management",
        "retention_policy":"autogen",
        "interval": "1d",
        "max_evals": 5,
        "type": "donut",
        "span": 10,
        "forecast": 5,
        "seasonality": {
            "daytime": true,
            "weekday": true
        }
}

But, now i wanted to train the mode, which doesnt work as it reports the following error:

ERROR:root:Data source not found (name = 'capacity_management')

But, I do have database name called 'capacity_management' in InfluxDB.

Would you please help?
